title: Helping Hand
data:

| Damage vs. large                      | 1d6                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

* [engraves](/wiki/Engrave "Engrave") as [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame")                                                                     |

| Weight                                | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| Material                              | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |

**Helping Hand** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [grappling hook](/wiki/Grappling_hook "Grappling hook").

## Description

While carried, Helping Hand blocks 19⁄20 of item-cursing effects such as the [curse items](/wiki/Curse_items "Curse items") [monster spell](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell"), and can be used to [engrave](/wiki/Engrave "Engrave") at the same quality as an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame"). While wielded, it confers [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching"), [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth"), [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning"), and gives an [enchantment](/wiki/Enchantment "Enchantment")-based bonus to all [searches](/wiki/Search "Search") - it additionally fully blocks item-cursing effects. [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") Helping Hand [untraps](/wiki/Untrap "Untrap") the character's current square or an adjacent square.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Helping_Hand\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Helping Hand

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   Helping Hand    
Base item grappling hook
Damage vs. small 1d2
Damage vs. large 1d6
To-hit bonus +0
Bonus versus (any)
Weapon skill flail
Size one-handed
Affiliation
  • lawful
When carried
  • blocks 19⁄20 of curses
  • engraves as athame
When wielded
  • automatic searching
  • stealth
  • warning
  • enchantment-based bonus to searching
  • fully blocks curses
When invoked
  • untraps adjacent square
Base price 50 zm
Weight 30
Material iron

Helping Hand is an artifact that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is lawful, and its base item is a grappling hook.

Description

While carried, Helping Hand blocks 19⁄20 of item-cursing effects such as the curse items monster spell, and can be used to engrave at the same quality as an athame. While wielded, it confers automatic searching, stealth, warning, and gives an enchantment-based bonus to all searches - it additionally fully blocks item-cursing effects. Invoking Helping Hand untraps the character's current square or an adjacent square.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
